A very useful concept which we also know from our social interactions world is trust.

One called Trust mirroring, which essentially says that a similar minded note tends to trust another node more than a random node, right?

In other words, your friend, for example, you would trust more with a movie recommendation than some random person walking on the street.

You can actually also utilize for the adaptation process.
